snippet.title: Mini City: Mayhem - Steam Next Fest Showcase Trailer (City Builder)
snippet.description:
Mini City: Mayhem is a chaos-filled city-builder where you build against time. Become the mayor of a tiny town, plop down tiny building blocks to build a working city to progress. Manage your roads and building connections. But be quick, because time is ticking!

Play the demo & wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2517440/Mini_City_Mayhem/
